detectors.description:
PumperToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#85-90) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#87)
detectors.markdown:
[PumperToken.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#L85-L90) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#L87)

detectors.description:
PumperToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#92-98) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#93)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#95)

detectors.description:

detectors.description: Variable PumperToken._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#47) is not in mixedCase

PumperToken.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#57-65) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 500000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#61)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#16)
	- PumperToken.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#67-69)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#17)
	- PumperToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#71-73)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- PumperToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#75-77)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#18)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- PumperToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#85-90)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#19)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- PumperToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#79-83)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#20)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#36)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#36-38)
